Letter to LB: 
Dear LB,

VDC practice showed the necessity of having counters to stealth field technology other than mutating into Omni. I had an idea of giving a certain tech the ability to block stealth field's and cloaking device's stealth bonus. Hence I have a question, how did you fix stealth field in 1.40, afaik in 1.31 it was corrupted (didn't work). Is there a way to block or disable your correction code for stealth field, based on availability of certain tech, e.g. sensors? I would really like to see it implemented in my mod, because of balance purposes. I will ask tf8 to do all the necessary coding. Please provide me (tf8) with information on how you did the stealth field fixing.
Edit: tf8 still can't figure out how you did jump-links on your code. Please explain how to do them too.

Irakly

Reply:
The Stealth code is around offset 0xE32BB in the exe file. My patch inserts a jump around there which leads to the fixed stealth check code at offset 0x17A3B0. Once the fixed code is executed, it jumps back to resume the original game code (code immediately after the first jump).
